attributes.action: Keep Piers Morgan out of Britian
attributes.additional_details:
Following an interview with Larry Pratt of the Gun owners of America, in which he personally abused his guest, a petition has been started with 31000 signatories to date(24/12/12) requesting Mr Morgan's deportation.

We the undersigned ask the home secretary to urge the US Government not to consider deporting him, on the basis the we do not want him back.
